technical_specifications.specification_text: Grade 60 steel reinforcement bars conforming to ASTM A615

source.exact_text: Steel reinforcement bars shall be Grade 60 conforming to ASTM A615

technical_specifications.specification_text: Ordinary Portland Cement Grade 53 conforming to IS 12269
M40 grade concrete with minimum cement content of 360 kg/m³

source.exact_text: Concrete shall be of M40 grade with minimum cement content of 360 kg/m3 as per IS 456:2000

technical_specifications.specification_text: APP modified bituminous waterproofing membrane, 4mm thick

source.exact_text: APP modified bituminous membrane 4mm thick as per IS 13982

technical_specifications.specification_text: Hot rolled structural steel sections conforming to IS 2062 Grade E250

source.exact_text: Structural steel sections shall conform to IS 2062 Grade E250

tasks.task_description: Site preparation including clearing, grubbing, and leveling of the project site

source.exact_text: The contractor shall carry out site preparation including clearing, grubbing, and leveling within 2 weeks of site handover

tasks.task_description: Foundation work including excavation, PCC, and RCC footing construction
deliverables: Completed foundation as per structural drawings

source.exact_text: Foundation work shall include excavation, PCC bed, and RCC footings as per approved structural drawings

tasks.task_description: Superstructure construction including columns, beams, and slab casting

source.exact_text: Superstructure shall be constructed as per approved structural drawings using M40 grade concrete
